name: Kiswahili
displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

options.label:
Mwanafunzi alipotoa jibu ambalo si sahihi, mwalimu alimkaripia au kumuadhibu
When a pupil responds incorrectly, the teacher scolds or punishes the pupil.

Mwanafunzi alipotoa jibu ambalo si sahihi, mwalimu alimtaka kujaribu tena au alimwendea mwanafunzi mwingine
When a pupil responds incorrectly, the teacher tells the pupil to try again or she moves on to another pupil

Mwanafunzi alipotoa jibu ambalo si sahihi, mwalimu alifafanua zaidi, alitoa vidokezo au alinyumbulisha swali katika lugha nyepesi zaidi
When a pupil responds incorrectly, the teacher asks a clarifying question, cues the pupil, or breaks down the task as appropriate
Hakuna jibu sahihi lililotolewa au halihusiki / No correct response given or not applicable

name: Kiswahili
displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

name: Kiswahili
displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

name: Kiswahili
displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

name: Kiswahili
displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

displayCode:
# get the index and append it to our variable name
index = if Utils.data("index")? then Utils.data("index") else 0
currentName = @getName()

name: Kiswahili
displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

prompt:
4. Majadiliano ya wanafunzi
Pupil discussion:
name: general_lesson_4

options.label:
Wanafunzi hawashiriki katika majadiliano
Pupils do not engage in discussions.

Ushiriki wa wanafunzi umejikita katika kujibu maswali wanapoulizwa
Pupil engagement in discussions is limited to responding to questions when called on

Ushiriki wa wanafunzi umejikita kwa baadhi ya wanafunzi kuanzisha mada, kuuliza na kujibu maswali wanapoulizwa
Pupils’ engagement in discussion is limited to some pupils initiating topics, posing and responding to questions

Wanafunzi kueleza maoni yao na kutetea hoja zao. Wanafunzi kutumia mjadala unaofaa katika kukubaliana au kutokukubaliana
Pupils state their opinions and defend them. Pupils use appropriate interaction patterns to agree or disagree

displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")

prompt:
Je ni vipi mwalimu ameweza kufuatilia uelewa wa wanafunzi?
1. How well did the teacher monitor the pupils’ understanding?
name: general_lesson_1

options.label:
Mwalimu hakuuliza swali lolote kwa wanafunzi
Teacher does not ask the pupils any questions

Mwalimu aliuliza maswali ya kukumbuka na sio maswali ya kupima uelewa
Teacher asks pupils recall or repetition questions, but not questions that check for the pupils understanding (e.g. recall or repetition questions only).

Mwalimu aliuliza maswali ya kupima uelewa, lakini hakutoa msaada zaidi
Teacher asks pupils questions to check for pupil understanding, but does not provide further assistance

Mwalimu aliuliza maswali ya kupima uelewa na alitoa msaada/ maelezo zaidi
Teacher asks pupils questions to check for pupil understanding and provides assistance/further explanation

displayCode:
Utils.data("ended", true) if Utils.data("index")? and ResultOfPrevious("ended_reading_#{Utils.data('index')}") is "1"

@skip() if ResultOfPrevious("observation_type") isnt "reading" or Utils.data("ended")

# set up configuration on first run
unless Utils.data("config")?
  Utils.data("config", {
    delay : 180 * 1000 # seconds X milliseconds
  })

# try to get a previous index
index = Utils.data("index")
index = 0 unless index?

# try to get start time
start = Utils.data("start")
unless start?
  start = (new Date()).getTime()
  Utils.data("start", start)

# increase index by 1 and save
index = index + 1
Utils.data("index", index)

# hide next button
$(".next.navigation").hide()

tick = =>
  console.log "tick"
  lastStart = Utils.data('start') + ( Utils.data('config').delay * (Utils.data('index')-1) )
  elapsed = ( new Date() ).getTime() - lastStart

  # update timer
  time = moment(Utils.data('config').delay - elapsed).format("m:ss")
  if elapsed < Utils.data('config').delay
    _(vm.currentView.subtestViews[vm.currentView.index].prototypeView.questionViews).last().setHint "If the lesson has not ended, select 'The lesson continues' and wait. Your next observation will begin automatically in: #{time}"

  # check to see if we should be going next
  if elapsed >= Utils.data('config').delay
    Utils.midAlert("Next observation")
    $(".next.navigation").show()
    @next()


# automatically go to next screen
interval = setInterval( =>
  console.log "ticking"
  tick()
, 1000 )

Utils.data("interval", interval)

@onClose = => clearInterval( Utils.data("interval") )

#
# Change variable names of questions to match index
#

index = Utils.data("index")

for question in @prototypeView.questionViews
  currentName = question.getName()
  question.setName("#{currentName}_#{index}")
